event: The Bennet family discusses Mr. Bingley's arrival at Netherfield Park.
The Meryton Assembly where the Bennet family and other locals first meet Mr. Bingley and Mr. Darcy.
the families discuss Mr. Darcy's behavior. Charlotte explains his pride might be due to his wealth.
Jane's suitability for Bingley is discussed. Elizabeth talks with Darcy.
During Jane's visit to Bingley's house, she falls ill in the rain. Elizabeth visits Jane and meets Mr. Bingley. Darcy shows interest in Elizabeth
Elizabeth visits Netherfield to see Jane and is caught in a rainstorm. She is forced to stay overnight.
Jane's health improves and Bingley shows interest in her. Elizabeth argues with Darcy, exchanging insults about their personalities.
Mr. Collins visits the Bennet family
Mr. Collins asks Elizabeth to reserve dances.
Mr. Collins proposes to Elizabeth, who refuses him.
Mrs. Bennet tries to recruit Charlotte to change Elizabeth's mind
Mr. Collins proposes to Charlotte Lucas, who accepts him.
Mr. Lucas announces to the rest of the Bennet family his daughter's engagement to Mr. Collins. Mrs. Bennet becomes agitated
Jane accepts Bingley's disinterest
Elizabeth agrees to travel to Hunsford to visit her friend Charlotte and Mr. Collins.
Elizabeth was going to visit Charlotte
Mr. Collins diligently prepares his houseguests for the visit to Rosings
Mr. Darcy, along with his cousin Colonel Fitzwilliam, will be visiting Rosings.
Elizabeth and Darcy meet again at Rosings. Darcy is polite but distant.
The following day, Darcy visits the Collins home. Only Elizabeth is at home
Mr. Darcy's proposal to Elizabeth and Elizabeth rejects Darcy's proposal
Mr. Darcy's letter to Elizabeth for explanation of his actions
Elizabeth reads the letter from Mr. Darcy
Elizabeth comes to London to visit the Gardiners
Elizabeth finally decides to tell Jane what happened during her visit to Hunsford
Elizabeth comes to London to visit the Gardiners
criticism of Elizabeth's family
Bingley and Darcy come to dine at the Bennets' home
Lady Catherine pays an unexpected visit to Longbourn
Elizabeth and Darcy explore their feelings for each other
